revisions.rev:
{{Use mdy dates|date=February 2011}} {{Year dab|777}} {{Year nav|777}} {{M1 year in topic}} __NOTOC__ Year '''777''' ('''[[Roman numerals|DCCLXXVII]]''') was a [[common year starting on Wednesday]] (link will display the full calendar) of the [[Julian calendar]]. The denomination 777 for this year has been used since the early medieval period, when the [[Anno Domini]] [[calendar era]] became the prevalent method in Europe for naming years.
== Events == <onlyinclude> === By place ===
====Africa==== * [[Rustamid|Ibn Rustam]] is recognized imam of the [[Ibadi|Ibadis]] in Maghrib.
==== Europe ==== * [[Charlemagne]] defeats the [[Saxons]]; their leader [[Widukind]] flees to [[Denmark]]. </onlyinclude>
== Births == * April – [[Pippin of Italy]], King of the [[Lombards|Langobardians]], son of [[Charlemagne]], not to be confused with Pepin "The Short" of France (born this year or 773)<ref>[http://www.thepeerage.com/p10320.htm The Peerage.com]</ref> * Queen Bertha of [[Toulouse]], one of Pippin of Italy's wives<ref>[http://www.familyorigins.com/users/b/l/o/David-A-Blocher-WA/FAMO2-0001/d72036.htm Family origins.com]</ref> * [[Masawaiyh|Yuhanna ibn Masawaiyh]], Assyrian physician * St. Barnard<ref>[http://www.catholic.org/saints/saint.php?saint_id=1677 Cahtolic online]</ref> * Hildegard, daughter of Emperor [[Charlemagne]] and Hildegarde of Swabia
== Deaths == *
